title: Pixel 3 keeps crashing when reboot initialised
content:
I have a Pixel 3 that crashes when I initiate a reboot from within the OS - it cannot be restarted until i plug it into the power (even though it indicates there is charge).
If I reboot it while it is plugged into a power source it works just fine.

I have noted that it does seem to lose its charge quicker than normal.

Part of my troubleshooting thus far has been a factory reset and removing non essential apps.
I have also run a TestM H/W check and it reported no issues.

I can only think that the charge connector may be playing up but i don't know how to validate this.

Anyone have any thoughts?
